title: The area of staff quarters/free sale component for various categories of employees shall be as per the norms prescribed by the concerned User Authority
clause_text: The area of staff quarters/free sale component for various categories of employees shall be as per the norms prescribed by the concerned User Authority.
section: 33(3) Buildings of Government/MCGM/Statutory Bodies, Semi- Government and PSU Offices:

source_pdf.text_snippet: The area of staff quarters/free sale component for various categories of employees shall be as per the norms prescribed by the concerned User Authority.
